entry.title: New release for Paperless Mobile: v3.1.6
New release for Paperless Mobile: v3.1.7
New release for Paperless Mobile: v3.1.8
New release for Paperless Mobile: v3.2.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix Typo in README.md by @markkastoun in https://github.com/astubenbord/paperless-mobile/pull/338
  • Feature: Notes and bugfixes by @astubenbord in https://github.com/astubenbord/paperless-mobile/pull/346

New Contributors

  • @markkastoun made their first contribution in https://github.com/astubenbord/paperless-mobile/pull/338

Full Changelog: https://github.com/astubenbord/paperless-mobile/compare/v3.1.8...v3.2.0

entry.title: New release for Paperless Mobile: v3.2.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Switch to pdfrx pdf rendering library by @astubenbord in https://github.com/astubenbord/paperless-mobile/pull/351
  • Update README.md: fix section Contributors rendering by @hermannoffen in https://github.com/astubenbord/paperless-mobile/pull/358
  • Bugfix/pdf viewer issue by @astubenbord in https://github.com/astubenbord/paperless-mobile/pull/364

New Contributors

  • @hermannoffen made their first contribution in https://github.com/astubenbord/paperless-mobile/pull/358

Full Changelog: https://github.com/astubenbord/paperless-mobile/compare/v3.2.0...v3.2.1
